Control patient receive instruction booklet SMS message . Both group patient take HbA1c test begin end study period ask measure blood glucose week record read monitor table 12 week . The primary outcome change HbA1c level , expect great among intervention patient end study . Secondary outcome include blood glucose level , treatment medication adherence , diabetes self-efficacy , rate hospital/ER visit , frequency blood glucose measurement , among others .
